str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A trial, proof; tried, approved character. From the same as dokimos; test; by implication, trustiness.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Listening to, obedient, submissive. From hupakouo; attentively listening, i.e. submissive.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
